textContent:
Step 3 Based on what you have discussed and learned, do you think there will be more Asian people who thrive in white-majority societies? First, decide on your stance (yes or no) and write why you think so/not with reasons/examples. Then, write a suggestion for making a society that accepts more Asian






Step 3
minorities.
